### Human : Hi Sophie, thank you so much for your feedback. I'm sorry we didn't hit our usual high standards for your stay and we will certainly investigate with our team your comments about the rubbish and cleanliness. It's a shame you didn't let us know about any of this when you'd arrived and when we'd checked with you you had settled in and all was ok as we would have most certainly got this addressed straight away. Our Service fee is not just to cover the cleaning but also be linen and utilities and is comparable to other homes operating in this area. Even, so just like you, we expect high standards of our team for our guests.  I have therefore organised via Airbnb to refund you for the Service Fee and an additional refund for the disappointment we caused. We've also sent in our maintenance team to investigate and repair any maintenance points you've raised, I've checked out maintenance report from the team prior to your stay and none of these items had been picked up so they must be very recent and so they had not been spotted prior to your stay. 
I notice you scored us low for communication and slow response, looking at our logs we generally responded within in less than 1 hour, often with 10 -15 minutes, we will of course and we always try to be pro-active by reaching out to guests and checking they have got everything they need ahead of their stay, arrived safely and got checked in and more importantly that all is ok. I can see from our logs that we have been proactive with our communications and only wish we'd had the chance to rectify the points you've raised  during your stay. 
We're glad you were able to make good use of the park with your dog and found the bathroom and other aspects of the house enjoyable during your stay. 
Thanks again for the feedback.

### Human : Hi Yasmin, just an update on your reimbursement request for the car rental you purchased. I tried to raise it with the management earlier unfortunately it was not approved. 

As mentioned previously, the document you signed for the compensation already includes the transportation, meal, and other expenses that you may have during your stay in San Diego for the egg retrieval. 

Please note that we are no longer reimbursing donors separately for expenses due to the fact that the flight airfare and hotel accommodation prices and other medical expenses related to egg donation drastically went up. With this, all expenses are now inclusive in the offer you are given.

As much as we'd love to continue your cycle now or to refund you for the car rental, we are only able to process any compensation on our end after the egg retrieval is successfully completed.

We also will be updating you promptly the next time that you will start the cycle so you can make final arrangements only when it is confirmed that your cycle is continued. Please expect further communication from Dina, your IVF coordinator, with any updates after the baseline ultrasound and bloodwork results are completed and reviewed by our physician. I will be assisting you with the flight tickets and hotel reservation as well as the processing of the compensation and reimbursement after the egg retrieval. The reimbursement includes any medications (bcps, CoQ10) that you paid out of pocket. Please keep the receipts for those or take a picture for safekeeping.

### Human : Ma’am;

Good day!
The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints supports the 31st celebration of National Family Week with the theme: Pamilyang Pilipino: Pagtugon sa Nagbabagong Pananaw at Panahon (Filipino Families:
Responding to Changing Perspectives and Times).
The National Family Week Celebration is in accordance with Proclamation No. 60 signed in 1992 in which the state declared every last week of September as National Family Week in recognition of the sanctity and value of the Family.
Consistent with this, The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints – Philippines Sipalay District joins in the celebration on September 30, 2023 through different activities. The objectives of the activities are the following: Foster meaningful relationships with community leaders, opinion influencers, media representatives, and leaders of non-government organizations who are instrumental in furthering our priesthood objectives; Enhance awareness of the Church's unwavering support for families and its commitment to upholding cherished family values; Elevate the Church's standing within the community by actively engaging in valuable service initiative; and Align our activities with the Philippines Area Plan.
In line with the celebration, I am humbly inviting your good office or your representative to attend our activities on September 30, 2023 at 8:00 am. 
Your positive response of our invitation will surely help us attain our objectives of this celebration.
God bless and more power!

Respectfully,

All the walls of the house have a lot of mold, we would have to wash them and this would have an additional cost, however, we prefer not to do it because it is most likely that the mold will not come out (our cleaner talked to the tenant and told him about this situation)

3. The house has 4 rooms, and 1 bathroom, however, room 1 was in such poor condition that the tenant told us that he would clean it himself, for this reason, it was not charged, we only charge 3 rooms and 1 bath.

4. Blinds are not included in the service but they can be added with a extra charge of $16 per set.

In accordance with the above, our cleaner could go back and do what is highlighted below, which is what corresponds to us.

Lounge room – light fitting 
Kitchen - light fitting, sides of the oven. 
Dining room – Cupboard inside and top.
Bed 2 – Inside Window.
Bed 4 - light fitting

In conclusion, everything else would have an additional cost, however, there is a lot of mold to remove and we don't think we have the tools to do it.

### Human : I am Brian Walsh, the father of Kyle Walsh, who played on the 3rd grade team last year. With tryouts upcoming and the season not far behind I was wondering if you knew who would be coaching the 4th grade team this year. Last season in my humble opinion was a disaster and an embarrassment to the MYAA program. The 3rd grade team was nowhere near ready to play the other teams at the start of the season nor at the end of the season. This unfortunately had to do with the coaching of the team. I really don't want to get into the gritty details by email of my thoughts but do not want the 4th grade team to be what the third grade team was which was poorly coached and never ready to play.I hesitate to say this but am being asked by a few other parents to make my thoughts known as my son was by far the best on the team and has only gotten better in the last year, playing and staring on high level AAU teams mainly with HoopGroup Shoreshots Inferno and winning tournaments all over the tristate. I can not allow him to play again on a team coached by John Werner. He did such a disservice to my child and the team as a whole. I am hoping that with my strong urging and what I am being told by other former player parents' strong feelings of last season we can move in the direction of a new coach. One that will allow a competitive team to be fielded with a goal of winning games and having a season that could be considered a success over another embarrassment

### Human : Hi Ruby,

Thank you for coming in today for your 2nd HCG bloodwork appointment. Your hCG level keeps looking good with a level of 418, CONGRATULATIONS\ud83d\ude0a!

1. Per Dr.Ho, there won’t be any medication dosage change for you for the next few days until your next bloodwork appointment.
2. Please continue taking 2 Metformin 1000mg daily for 30 days.
3. Please continue taking 1 Levothyroxine 50mcg daily for 30 days.
4. Please continue taking Estrace 2mg(1 tablet) orally daily.
5. Please continue doing Estrace 2mg (1 tablet) vaginally at bedtime everyday. NOTE: ideally, the finger needs to be all the way, in order to make sure that the pills stay in deep enough.
6. Please continue subcutaneous injection Heparin 5000 units (draw 0.25ml) daily at a consistent time.
7. Please continue taking 1 pill of Prednisone 10mg tablet daily at bedtime until Dr.Ho’s further instructions.
8. Please continue taking 1 prenatal vitamin and 1 Aspirin 81mg orally daily.
9. Please continue with one progesterone (Prometrium)200mg daily orally at evening times.
10. Please continue with doing TWO shots for your Progesterone 1 ml intramuscular injection DAILY(one shot in the morning, one shot in the evening, total of 2 ml). Please try to stay consistent with the injection times.
11. You are scheduled to come back for your 3rd HCG and progesterone bloodwork at 10:00 am on Monday,07/03/23.

Thank you so much and Good luck with everything!
-Gia

### Human : Hi Anne, 
Thanks for your message. We're sorry to hear about your Mum's fall on the stairs and have taken your adivce to add additional details to the description of the property with the following: Please note: 
"This property is a traditional Victorian terrace and therefore the stairs might not be suitable for people with mobility issues. However, there is a downstairs bathroom with walk-in shower and a single bed in the snug and also double sofa bed in the living room for guests preferring to remain downstairs."
We had already ticked on the option that the property has stairs to access room upstairs.
Our advice would be in future to contact your hosts to let them know of your situation. If you had contact us by phone, text, email or booking.com messages we could have helped. There is a ground floor bathroom and a single bedroom and also a double sofa bed in the living room that we could have popped round to prepare for you. Alternatively we could have moved you to our two bedroom ground floor apartment next door at no extra cost. 

I've passed on your suggestion regarding an additional handrail on the stairs and also to take a look at the carpet that was recently fitted to see if this can be adjusted. 

Thanks again for getting in touch and we hope your mum recovers soon.

Kind  regards

Ross 
TLC Stay

### Human : Hi Michal,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing your concerns. I apologize if my previous message did not reach you. I understand that you have some questions, and I want to make sure I provide you with the right information.

Firstly, I want to explain that before proceeding with any treatments, it is essential for us to establish you as a patient at our facility. This initial consultation serves the purpose of understanding your needs and developing an appropriate treatment plan.

Regarding your technical questions, it would be best to consult with the lab or our physician directly. While we can provide you with basic information about costs and processes, more detailed queries such as treatment plans, protocols, and storage options require a comprehensive consultation with the physician who can provide you with precise guidance.

Also, we already offer a highly competitive package for our cycles. Unfortunately, we do not provide additional discounts for multiple packages.

Please let us know if you are interested in scheduling a consultation with our Dr. Once we have established your care and developed a protocol specifically for you, we can discuss the cost more accurately.

### Human : Hello, this is Nicholas from Vertical Identity, your Drug and Alcohol Random Pool Company. I tried calling you but you were unavailable. Your current subscription is set to automatically renew on June 25th, as long as there is an active card on file. The credit card we have on file for you is the one ending in 0876. Also, we have 2 drivers in the random pool right now. If any of the information is incorrect, please let us know. Be reminded that as a Motor Carrier owner, you are required by the FMCSA:
> to obtain a Motor Vehicle Record (MVR) every 12 months for all drivers
> to complete an annual Clearinghouse Query for all drivers
> to ensure you have a valid Medical Certificate which requires a DOT Physical Test (at least every 2 years)
> to complete a 2-hour Supervisor Training Course, if you have 1+ CDL drivers under your authority (not required for O/O)
> to have a Drug and Alcohol Policy, if you have 1+ CDL drivers under your authority (not required for O/O)
Let us know when you want to order these items. It is best to maintain your compliance and be ready in case of a DOT/FMCSA Safety Audit. You can respond to this text, or you can call us at 602-899-1606. 

Thank you.

### Human : Okay so our process is unlike any other online or traditional  dealership. Then I will start showing you vehicles that are fully approved in full email presentations.
